description: This Thai banana in coconut milk recipe is delicious just as it is but if you're feeling creative or want to make it more substantial, try topping it with seeds, nuts, cacao nibs, or even granola.
keywords: banana in coconut milk, sweet soup, Thai Banana in Coconut Milk
name: Thai Banana in Coconut Milk
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon white sugar (organic for vegan-friendly) (or to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium saucepan, bring the coconut milk to a gentle boil.
Add the sliced bananas and reduce the heat to a simmer. Cook until the banana pieces are tender but not falling apart, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes.
Add sugar and stir until it's fully dissolved. Sprinkle with salt. Serve warm.
